description.value:
This vial holds enough sticky essence of a distilled element to apply to one weapon or to douse one enemy.

Level: 3
Category: Alchemical Item (Oil)
Time: 1 hour
Component Cost: See Alchemical Item
Formula Cost: 120 gp
Key Skill: Arcana, Nature, or Thievery

Utility Power âœ¦ Consumable (Minor Action)

Effect: You apply the essence to a weapon or ammunition. The level of the clinging essence must be equal to or higher than the level of the weapon or ammunition. Until the end of your next turn, damage dealt by a weapon attack using that weapon or ammunition is of the chosen type instead of any other type.



Published in Mordenkainen's Magnificent Emporium, page(s) 130.
